_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PANEL
name: Typesense
author: typesense@pterodactyl-eggs.com
description: Typesense is a fast, typo-tolerant search engine optimized for instant search-as-you-type experiences and ease of use. It is an open source alternative to Algolia and an easier-to-use alternative to ElasticSearch.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# Typesense Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server

echo "Starting Typesense installation..."
cd /mnt/server || { echo "Failed to change directory to /mnt/server"; exit 1; }

echo "Creating necessary directories..."
mkdir -p /mnt/server/data

echo "Setting permissions for data directory..."
chmod 777 /mnt/server/data
echo "-----------------------------------------"
echo "Installation completed..."
echo "-----------------------------------------"

variables.name: Typesense API Key
variables.description: The admin API key for Typesense. Min 40 characters recommended.
